dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependencies.name: py-toml
dependencies.description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git

dependent_to.name: py-codecov
dependent_to.description: Hosted coverage reports for Github, Bitbucket and Gitlab.

dependent_to.name: n2p2
dependent_to.description:
N2p2 (The neural network potential package) provides ready-to-use
software for high-dimensional neural network potentials in computational
physics and chemistry.

dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp
dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions

dependent_to.name: py-nose2
dependent_to.description: unittest2 with plugins, the succesor to nose

dependent_to.name: py-abcpy
dependent_to.description:
ABCpy is a highly modular, scientific library for approximate Bayesian
computation (ABC) written in Python. It is designed to run all included
ABC algorithms in parallel, either using multiple cores of a single
computer or using an Apache Spark or MPI enabled cluster.

dependent_to.name: py-nosexcover
dependent_to.description:
A companion to the built-in nose.plugins.cover, this plugin will write
out an XML coverage report to a file named coverage.xml.

dependent_to.name: py-cov-core
dependent_to.description: plugin core for use by pytest-cov, nose-cov and nose2-cov

dependent_to.name: py-coveralls
dependent_to.description: coveralls.io is a service for publishing your coverage stats online.
